content.en: Engine combustion optimization: Researchers have been exploring various ways to optimize the processing of in-cylinder pressure signals for diagnosing combustion in internal combustion engines. They have been using ad-hoc methods and experience-based algorithms for this purpose. Additionally, statistical criteria are being used to determine the cut-off frequencies of low-pass filters for filtering in-cylinder pressure in diesel engines.
content.da: Optimering af motorforbrænding: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige måder at optimere behandlingen af tryksignaler i cylinderen til diagnosticering af forbrænding i forbrændingsmotorer. De har anvendt ad hoc-metoder og erfaringsbaserede algoritmer til dette formål. Desuden anvendes statistiske kriterier til at bestemme grænsefrekvenserne for lavpasfiltre til filtrering af tryk i cylinderen i dieselmotorer.
